lender.name: Mary
lender.loan_because: I like to help people that are less fortunate than my family and I.
lender.occupational_info: I hire and train associates in a distribution center for a large retailer. I also work on projects that help increase associate job satisfaction and help develop their sense of purpose.

lender.name: Andrew
lender.occupational_info:
Free / Open-Source Software programmer @ Intel for living, currently still studying at uni.
Contact me at "Andrzej Zaborowski " balrogg@gmail.com

lender.name: Laurel
lender.occupational_info: My husband and I run a program to help 18-23 year-olds transition into the adult world. They learn building, cooking, gardening, and other hands-on skills, while also discerning their call to serve in the world.

lender.name: Kelly
lender.loan_because: It is so easy and rewarding.
lender.occupational_info: I work for the municipality that I live. I try and get all employees to think more sustainable when making decisions.

lender.name: Andrew
lender.loan_because: It's the smart way to help people
lender.occupational_info: I make websites for companies like newspapers and banks

lender.name: Ryan
lender.loan_because: I am fortunate enough to be in the position to help others when I can.

lender.name: Matilda
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference to those I otherwise would never meet. I want to impact the world. I want to be more than some self interested American teenager. I want to be able to feel good about at least one part of my life. I want to take part in a sustainable way of helping. I want to BE something.

lender.name: Laura
lender.loan_because: "No one is useless in this world who lightens the burdens of another."--Charles Dickens

lender.name: Leonard
lender.occupational_info: Copper Canyon, Texas

lender.name: Anne
lender.loan_because: I admire it when people work hard to make a living. I would like to encourage them to keep going with their efforts.
lender.occupational_info: I organize shipments of machinery spare parts from Germany to Mexico and Brasil.

lender.name: Colin
lender.loan_because: Economic prosperity creates healthy communities.
lender.occupational_info: Our company develops computer software used by teachers, administrators, students, and parents in schools.

lender.name: puneet
lender.loan_because: I like the idea of sharing money with people who need it. May this help them lead abundant and prosperous lives and bring them fame and glory. The idea of even a small amount flowing down to people who actually need it and empowering them is absolutely a high for me. Wealth shared only makes it more wealthy and worthy. Thanks for this opportunity Kiva. I hope this brings a smile to an unknown person somewhere in the world and may God Bless you people. Wishing each entrepreneur and lender here as well as Kiva great success.
lender.occupational_info: Content is my driving force and I have discovered great revenue streams around content and will be having my 2nd office later next month. I also write a weekly tech column for a newspaper, I am the editor of a magazine. I like working in the new economy and discovering new revenue streams and also helping others achieve their dreams.

lender.name: Kurt
lender.loan_because: There is only one world...

lender.name: Rebecca
lender.loan_because: I think that microloaning will someday change the world.
lender.occupational_info: I am a student, and a social change activist.

lender.name: Anne Kathrin Maria
lender.loan_because: I'm dreaming of a better world and do not want it to be just a dream

lender.name: Kate
lender.loan_because: I live in a country with unlimited possibilities compared to many other countries on earth.
lender.occupational_info: My job is working at a non-profit company devoted to the advancement of nuclear medicine. I raise funds to foster education.

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: I think it's important that people who want to work and improve their lives have the means to do so. I also loan in memory of my mother in law, who helped many people over her lifetime. Both she and I were single mothers, who struggled at times, and wanted to help others who struggle.

lender.name: Geoff
lender.loan_because: It makes me feel good to help someone build their business and become successful.
lender.occupational_info: I am retired from a 30 year career in the insurance business. I also helped start a company from the beginning in 2000 and sold it in 2006.

lender.name: Efrain
lender.occupational_info: I promote companies, I teach people how to internet market, I help people with the computer. I work with a friend and help him a lot. I also learn a lot, most of all my computer knowledge is from the programs and software I use.

lender.name: Janet
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do.

lender.name: Josh & Tiea
lender.loan_because: God calls on all of us to love our neighbors as ourselves -- it's nearly impossible to do, but we must try.
lender.occupational_info: We import earth-friendly wine from family-owned vineyards in the Mediterranean into the United States.

lender.name: Lauren
lender.loan_because: i want to help people
lender.occupational_info: educational

lender.name: Jenifer
lender.loan_because: I have been fortunate and I am very thankful.
lender.occupational_info: I work in community mental health.

lender.name: HENRY
lender.loan_because: I want to invest my time because of the difficulty of working too much hard and load, the accident brought me a limited mobilization. I have five children and I want to continue working while having the passion of having a grocery store not until somebody could entrust their resources to me. It will be a big hope for my whole family.There's always a minute chances for every striving person in Mindanao , Philippines. There's always be a big challenge here, political and economic, however, your every single penny could give hope and meaning to our lives. I sincerely wanting to loan an amount of $500 for a better start, a grocery store.
lender.occupational_info: I am very good in public relationship, business is business, can cook great taste food, hard working even as a tenant /machine operator I worked overnight to have an income of $5 dollars a day.

lender.name: Laurie
lender.loan_because: Well, I'm not gonna preach. There's a million good reasons for lending with Kiva. Sometimes it's just good to give a little help!
lender.occupational_info: I work in the oilsands in northern Alberta, Canada, shipping and receiving industrial material. ***A proud member of Teamster Local 362!!!!***

lender.name: tylermhawkins
lender.loan_because: Life has been very kind to me.

lender.name: Don
lender.loan_because: Simply because it is the right thing to do. I see the face of Jesus in many of those seeking assistance.
lender.occupational_info: I am a worship leader and social worker -- helping those who are disabled and homeless or at risk of homelessness.

lender.name: Rachael
lender.loan_because: I want to help people in other countries that don't have as many opportunities as I do.
lender.occupational_info: I am in school in Canberra. I like sports and play Soccer and skateboard.

lender.name: Samuel
lender.loan_because: It's an easy way to promote sustainable change in countries that really need it.

lender.name: Kelly
lender.loan_because: I want to help those in need and try to give them better lives! :)

lender.name: Roger
lender.loan_because: As a small business owner I can appreciate the inner drive and strength to take the initiative, and a leap of faith, in creating your own means of income. That is something that I wholeheartedly support.

lender.name: Les & Stacey
lender.loan_because: it is an easy way to make a big difference in someones life who is less fortunate than us.

lender.name: Jeff
lender.loan_because: *If you have more than you need, you probably have something that belongs to someone else* -- Dr. Kelly Duncan -- my father

lender.name: Queen Elizabeth
lender.loan_because: I am originally from Guatemala and I want to give back to my country and other developing countries.
lender.occupational_info: Everyday, I seek opportunities to make others happy.

lender.name: Celeste & Sons
lender.loan_because: My sons (10 and 13) review and decide who to lend to. This is a learning experience for them, and a wonderful opportunity for them to feel that they can make a valuable impact in someone's World.
lender.occupational_info: I run a Portfolio and Program Mgmt department for a large division of a global employer. We keep track of project status across our division, and also handle internal cross-departmental projects.

lender.name: HARRISON & JOYCE
lender.loan_because: We want to help people help themselves.

lender.name: Joan
lender.loan_because: first and foremost, we are a global community and what effects one, effects us all. Also, I've had people help me get on my feet in the past and I am now in a position to do the same for someone else.
lender.occupational_info: Massage therapy is a hands-on approach to healing. I use manual therapeutic techniques to loosen and relax muscles and their surrounding connective tissue coverings, and relieve painful muscle tension that has been affected by stress, injury and illness.

lender.name: nanhana
lender.loan_because: I like Kiva.
lender.occupational_info: Grade 7 randomista.

lender.name: www.InfinityMagic.com
lender.loan_because: I would like others to have the same opportunity I have had to try and make a business work and better their lives and those around them.
lender.occupational_info: We have thousands of magic tricks available to be purchased online and shipped to your home.

lender.name: Brian
lender.loan_because: access to basic financial services is a human right.
lender.occupational_info: I help others invest for the betterment of our planet, to make a fair profit, and towards social equity.

lender.name: Colleen
lender.loan_because: Supporting hard-working individuals seeking to better the lives of their families and communities is an honor.

lender.name: Dorota
lender.loan_because: it is a great and easy way to help others.

lender.name: Urantia Book friend
lender.loan_because: My Father says be generous to our brothers and sisters, and we are indeed all brothers and sisters in the Fathers house.
lender.occupational_info: I do financial papers for the government

lender.name: Raj
lender.loan_because: That's the least I can do. We all have our excuses for not contributing enough and then the days go by. With each passing day, opportunities are lost; for the borrowers, it's their survival and survival of many other who depend on them.
lender.occupational_info: My work is related to improving the TV watching experience.

lender.name: Agnes
lender.loan_because: Micro credits make a huge impact on some peoples lives - it's the best form of tunneling money to where it's most needed - best of luck to your business!

lender.name: Judy
lender.loan_because: I strongly believe that I was blessed to be born into a country that offers me a safe, stable life in freedom - with the opportunity to make a living for me and my family. So I want to give back to people who have to struggle.
lender.occupational_info: I am translating medical reports and helping patients in a big hospital.

lender.name: Peng Wu
lender.loan_because: I like to help people making a better life. I lend though this website because I can become a lender starting as little as 25 USD.
lender.occupational_info: Now I am working in a very small company as both accountant and office clerk.

lender.name: Julian and Paloma
lender.loan_because: We want to help people who have interesting dreams for their futures.

lender.name: Jess
lender.loan_because:
I have been very blessed and the best thing we can do is pay it forward.
Be the change you want to see in the world.
lender.occupational_info: When children get sick, I make appointments for them to see a doctor.

lender.name: Peter
lender.loan_because: life is a bucket brigade
lender.occupational_info: I make bread

lender.name: Stephanie and kai
lender.loan_because: We believe in the power of individuals to change their lives.
lender.occupational_info: Teacher, mom and dad of two children.

lender.name: Chris & Jody
lender.loan_because: We want to help other women in world to have a successful business
lender.occupational_info: I design and sew window treatments.

lender.name: Ulli and Angelika
lender.loan_because: It is a wonderful idea... and the money goes on and on... and it goes directly to the people who need it ... and... and... and...

lender.name: Petter
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do. And I do it because I can.
lender.occupational_info: I work with property projects around Norway.

lender.name: Akiko M
lender.loan_because:
You must be the change you want to see in the world.
Mahatma Gandhi

lender.name: Chippindall's
lender.loan_because: for such a small amount people can band together to make a big difference to someone else in the world.
lender.occupational_info: We are a young Australian Family and we want to teach our children to be thankful for what they have - and to always look to help others.

lender.name: Debra
lender.loan_because: It feels great to help other people achieve their goals.

lender.name: Aaron
lender.loan_because: I think it's a great idea!
lender.occupational_info: Fix computers, servers, and networks for companies.

lender.name: Mary
lender.loan_because: I love people in our world we are one striving to live and b happy and have families to surround ourselves with love.
lender.occupational_info: Find a way to help others take care of themselves

lender.name: Karin
lender.loan_because: I can and it makes me feel good to help people who are willing to help themselves

lender.name: Julian
lender.loan_because: I can!

lender.name: Cathy & Jerry
lender.loan_because: we want to support people trying to make a better life for themselves and their family
lender.occupational_info: Work in the Oil Sands Industry in Northern Alberta Canada

lender.name: Andrew
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I believe in preventative medicine, which is why I believe in Kiva.org....because to me the best way to alleviate global health and wellness issues is to confront the economic inequalities that cause them.

lender.name: Marilyn
lender.loan_because: its an easy, practical way to help someone work towards a better life.

lender.name: Donna
lender.loan_because: I support the arts worldwide and want to see traditional arts and crafts survive.

lender.name: Isabel

lender.occupational_info: I am a management assistant speaking 5 languages and working for a SME in Germany.

lender.name: Debbie and Ric
lender.loan_because: I believe my little bit of extra money can make a big change in someone else's life.
lender.occupational_info: My research focused on how schools can meet the needs of high school students who are recovering from drug and alcohol addiction.

lender.name: Roland
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: bille
lender.loan_because: i can

lender.name: Kristina & Roland
lender.loan_because: We believe in the value of these loans for the people for the world economy in a bigger scale.

lender.name: Cindy
lender.loan_because: my best friend introduced me to kiva and Yunus's book on microlending.
lender.occupational_info: I teach 3rd and 4th year dental students clinical dentistry and also work in private practice.

lender.name: Zac and Kerri
lender.loan_because: We have been blessed by the generosity of others and because we are inspired by the stories of these entrepreneurs.
lender.occupational_info: Zac makes movies. Kerri works at a college. We both seek to create innovative ways to inspire, educate, and entertain others.

lender.name: Lynne
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed and want to share what I can.
lender.occupational_info: I help companies develop new medical devices and products.

lender.name: G&R
lender.loan_because: We like helping others.
lender.occupational_info: G is a psychotherapist at a Pastoral Counseling Clinic - working with people of all income levels and needs. R is a Math teacher.

lender.name: Teri
lender.loan_because: I'd like to see all people empowered.
lender.occupational_info: I care for others and teach them to take care of themselves.

lender.name: Cynthia
lender.loan_because: every little bit helps
lender.occupational_info: I provide information and support to families with genetic conditions.

lender.name: Kirk
lender.loan_because: I saw an article about Kiva in the Minneapolis Star Tribune newspaper. I was excited learning about Kiva and discovering how I can make a real difference in someone's life. I have been blessed with a good life and want to help others improve theirs as well.
lender.occupational_info: I am the transportation manager for a Minneapolis - based global manufacturing company. My department contracts with freight carriers to move our inbound raw materials and outbound finished goods within the USA and around the world. We manage our carriers to help our co-workers provide solutions to our customers.

lender.name: Tilde
lender.loan_because: I want to help other people improve their lives!
lender.occupational_info: I work hard to be successfull!

lender.name: Wim
lender.loan_because: I think micro loans are a great way to support those less fortunate, while rewarding initiative.

lender.name: Richard
lender.loan_because: I can and it's the right thing to DO.
lender.occupational_info: I teach people about their society and their government and their laws.

lender.name: Marjam
lender.loan_because: I think that this is a very good idea and I believe that everyone should help if he/she can..
lender.occupational_info: a lot of telephoning, bookkeeping and I keep our data base updated

lender.name: Sibylle
lender.loan_because: I want to support especially woman who take care of their families in the third world countries
lender.occupational_info: I think every body knows the profession of a teacher...

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: Person to person is the only way to truly make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: I help improve business processes to increase profitability.

lender.name: Heike
lender.occupational_info: I write about Chinese culture for a German public.

lender.name: Grace
lender.loan_because: It's such a small gesture yet it makes an incredibly huge impact on the lives of others. And you also get the warm fuzzies.
lender.occupational_info: I figure out how to present information and ideas effectively and in aesthetically pleasing ways.

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I sell furniture in a retail shop.

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: I want to give back a little of the opportunity I have received.
lender.occupational_info: I work for the Minnesota Department of Health and help our partners (hospitals, clinics, counties) exchange private medical information in such a way that it does not get lost or made public.

lender.name: Cyril Montana
lender.loan_because: I am always struggling about the way this world is going on. And I think I find a way to feel a little less inactive about it. This is just a great idea!!!
lender.occupational_info: Well, I am writing novels in french, and my last book will be translate in Italian... I write, read, write, read...

lender.name: Stephen L
lender.loan_because: I want to help repair the world.
lender.occupational_info: I take care of steam boilers that warm apartment buildings and small businesses.

lender.name: Derek
lender.loan_because: I want to help as many people as I can.
lender.occupational_info: I sell Monster Energy Drink

lender.name: Dylan
lender.loan_because: All of our futures our connected on this planet
lender.occupational_info: Making messes, helping people

lender.name: C.J.
lender.loan_because: Together we can do more then any of us can do alone.
lender.occupational_info: Help others create a vision for what is possible.

lender.name: Dennis @ Patty
lender.loan_because: For a amall amount of money we can make a difference in someones life.
lender.occupational_info: I rent housing.

lender.name: cathy
lender.loan_because: It is important to share with others. Kiva enables me to share with those who are working hard and deserve assistance.
lender.occupational_info: I help manage the finances of businesses.

lender.name: Mutlu Family
lender.loan_because:
We believe in a global community and helping each other out when we can.
"If you want others to be happy, practice compassion. If you want to be happy, practice compassion. " - Dalai Lama

lender.name: Cathy
lender.loan_because: I think of the good life I have, the goods and services available to me, the family support, and the variety in my life. If what I do as a lender contributes to someone else's happiness, then I get immense joy from that.
lender.occupational_info: I manage a team of people who help employer groups obtain group health insurance coverage. We try to make it affordable.

lender.name: Monty
lender.loan_because: We're all in this together--or we should be.
lender.occupational_info: When the government reduces or stops paying benefits to a person, that person can ask a judge to review the case to see if the government decision was right. I am such a judge.

lender.name: George
lender.loan_because: It's the cool thing to do... right?
lender.occupational_info: I help companies do what they do better

lender.name: Ellen
lender.loan_because: I realize how lucky I have been all of my life. I have 4 grown children who are working and successful each in their own way. I am glad for the opportunity to help someone less fortunate, with aspirations and a good work ethic to achieve their goal.

lender.name: david
lender.loan_because: I believe it is the most effective way of improving our society
lender.occupational_info: All of our ventures work to enable others - through product execution and distribution of revenues. We think Kiva is a perfect partner to do so and we look forward to funneling more investments towards Kiva.org

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: i want to encourage people to help themselves
lender.occupational_info: helping people use money wisely

lender.name: Nami
lender.occupation: Teach For America - Secondary English Teacher
lender.loan_because: everyone could use a helping hand, and I have a hand to help with.

lender.name: Nancy
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do.

lender.name: Annie
lender.loan_because: What seems such a small amount of money to me can make a terrific impact on someone else's life.
lender.occupational_info: I manage the administrative operations for a large library system in Virginia.

lender.name: penny
lender.loan_because: I just discovered this website and think it is great. Everyday I would sit around and think about what I could do to empower those who are less fortunate than I. After reading about Kiva I knew this would be a good place for me to begin. Knowing I can provide some assistance for hardworking, struggling families to sustain themselves is a gift to me. I look forward to sponsoring many more of these wonderfully spirited business owners and will be rooting for them all the way .

lender.name: Rose
lender.loan_because: Ever since I visited Uganda on a missions trip in December 05, Africa and its people hold a special place in my heart. I want to be able to help them even if I'm far away.
lender.occupational_info: I work with preschoolers with Autism. I am one of the coordinators of the program, so I oversee the teachers and assistants and work with the children and their families.

lender.name: C & A
lender.loan_because: we think this is important.

lender.name: Barry Abrahamsen
lender.loan_because: We have more than we need.

lender.name: Yoshiko
lender.loan_because: this is a lot like growing plants in my garden, instead the people are growing into their potential.
lender.occupational_info: I help bring electricity to buildings.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: It is very satisfying to be able to help other people to improve their living standards by making a donation that you know is going to go directly to the people you have chosen
lender.occupational_info: My wife and i own a dried fruit manufacturing business in australia

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: Its the kind of thing that anyone can do. Making small differences like this - and at the same time demonstrating a faith in human nature and hard work - is rewarding.
lender.occupational_info: I work out the details and logistics of sports television here in the US.

lender.name: Diana
lender.loan_because: I am so fortunate to be.

lender.name: Candy
lender.loan_because: someone helped me when I needed it most and I want to do the same for someone else.
lender.occupational_info: As a hygienist I help people take care of their teeth. I clean their teeth then teach them how to keep them clean everyday.

lender.name: Tina
lender.loan_because: Everyone needs help at some point. My heart’s desire is to support, encourage and allow God to use me to bless those less fortunate than myself -> so they can have the opportunity to provide for their family and live more comfortably.
lender.occupational_info: I am a wife and mother of 2 children, and I work part time as an accountant.

lender.name: Siri
lender.loan_because: A great way to empower and feel connected to people.

lender.name: Daryl
lender.loan_because: Because even though my natural desire is to want 'more' and 'more', the reality is, my family and I are amazingly blessed. I believe we should take seriously the call to 'love our neighbor' and through Kiva, I can love a neighbor that happens to be just a little further away. I pray this small sacrifice is, indeed, a blessing to another family.
lender.occupational_info: I work at a large church, having the honor of overseeing all of the technical systems within that church, including leading a staff of 6 and over 100 volunteers whom serve our congregation through audio, video, and lighting systems and programming within our church services.

lender.name: Cid
lender.loan_because: An earth Angel gave me this Gift to share.

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: I want to
lender.occupational_info: challenging

lender.loan_because: ... i like to!

lender.occupational_info: I work at the airport in Munich - Germany and so I am host to a lot of people all over the world

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: I have much more than I need because I happen to live in a wealthy country, and others who live in other parts of the world have so little. And well this simply doesn't seem fair. A child born in Cambodia deserves the same as one born in North America. Neither one should go hungry, cold or shoeless.

lender.name: Jim
lender.loan_because: We all want to change the world but don't know how. This is a great way to start
lender.occupational_info: I look for new areas of business for my company.

lender.name: Jason
lender.loan_because: it just feels right

lender.name: Chelsea
lender.loan_because: I want to help people and make a difference for the better in other peoples lives.
lender.occupational_info: I am young and just learning in the classroom still, I don't have a job yet.

lender.name: Croix
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: Keystone Montessori
lender.loan_because: it supports people around the world in fulfilling the fundamental needs of humans: food, shelter, clothing.
lender.occupational_info: Montessori education for young children in Massachusetts.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: I want to make the world a better place!
lender.occupational_info: I help to provide products that help people get well

lender.name: Amanda and Kyle
lender.loan_because: We loan to Ecologically Advance Mankind.
lender.occupational_info: We collect recycleables from our community and use the deposits to provide microloans.

lender.name: Martha & Chuck
lender.loan_because: So little does so much.

lender.name: Soroptimist International of Seaford
lender.loan_because: We want to support women entreprenuers internationally.
lender.occupational_info: Our mission is to improve the lives of women and children in our community and throughout the world.

lender.name: Khalfani Rushiddin
lender.loan_because: I love our human family more than I can express in words or deeds.

lender.name: ClareandLaurie
lender.occupation: Episcopal Priest and Hospital Financial counselor
lender.loan_because: Small seeds reap large harvests.
lender.occupational_info: We work to try to do a bit of good in the world.

lender.name: Julie
lender.loan_because: alot of people helped me get where I am.
lender.occupational_info: I work to improve my community through policies and projects. Currently I am trying to build a bike trail.

lender.name: Johannes
lender.loan_because: Being able to support someone who has the motivation and willpower to change their lives for the better, "knowing" that the money ends up in the right place, is a possibility I have been looking for in ages. I must say Kiva is nothing but brilliant!

lender.name: Tom
lender.occupation: Product Manager, Interim CFO at a Bay Area startup
lender.loan_because: It's a great (and innovative) way to help people help themselves and improve their quality of life.

lender.name: Amandalyn Cox
lender.loan_because: People are important.

lender.name: Joni
lender.loan_because: I am grateful for a blessed life
lender.occupational_info: Listener, helper,Friend I hope

lender.name: Tim
lender.loan_because: Businesses require financial capital to support human and intellectual capital opportunities and visions.
lender.occupational_info: Helping people create new models for doing business worldwide.

lender.name: Zoe
lender.loan_because: this is effective help
lender.occupational_info: I help people that are sad and confused

lender.name: Preetima
lender.loan_because: I understand the struggles of trying to make ends meet, and want to make a small difference in someone's life.
lender.occupational_info: I am a free lance clothes designer.

lender.name: Serge Akagah
lender.loan_because: I like and trust the system... Watch http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=DwO6pmbYDo8 and you will understand that you and me can change the world; not the G8, the G20 even the United Nations...

lender.name: Rachel
lender.loan_because: I can. :)

lender.name: Jeff
lender.loan_because: I make more than I need and the same can't be said for the people I loan to.

lender.name: Jyoti
lender.loan_because: In western countries we take too many things for granted. What is a small object to us - a pair of shoes, a bike, or a small amount of money - can drastically improve the quality of someone's life. I especially support women, as they represent the starting engine of socio-economic changes: big changes start from small ones, maybe confined only to the household or local community. One woman can change many things, but many women can change everything!

lender.name: Manzel
lender.loan_because: we have to share our blessings.

lender.name: Jeff
lender.loan_because: I like supporting people in improving their lives.
lender.occupational_info: I am the keyboard player in a rock band, which is part of a larger group of musicians who perform for people with mental illness and the elderly. I also do grantwriting to support this project.

lender.name: BLaM
lender.loan_because: Small amounts of money to us can be large amounts to others.
lender.occupational_info: B works at a factory. L makes jewelry out of silver. M goes to school and reads anything she can get her hands on.

lender.name: Grant & Harvey
lender.loan_because: I've never seen an easier way to help others, to help themselves. This is brilliant!

lender.name: Karen
lender.loan_because: I want to help other people

lender.name: Luís
lender.loan_because: Big ideas can not be stop by lack of money, especially when that ideas can change a life of a person or an intently family.

lender.name: Kyle and Karen
lender.loan_because: This is a very easy way to make your small amount of money turn into something very useful- over and over again.
lender.occupational_info: We make music and buildings together!

lender.name: Rita
lender.loan_because: I have been fortunate enough to have the money to establish a stable lifestyle. Through loans, I hope I can help other establish the same stable lifestyle I have gained.
lender.occupational_info: I create art, such as paintings, drawings, sculptures, and ceramics and sell them. In addition, I am a musician, playing shows around my town frequently. While doing this, I am attending a state university to further study art and design in order to find a more advanced job.

lender.name: Pam
lender.loan_because: I believe that every person deserves a chance at a better life, and because I want my daughter to learn that we are all part of one community!
lender.occupational_info: I am a pharmacist - I sell medicine and help people understand diseases and medications.

lender.name: Stephanie
lender.loan_because: I want to help people less fortunate. "If not but for a toss of a coin I would be you and you would be me"

lender.name: Alex Young
lender.loan_because: It makes me feel happy when I help someone less fortunate myself.
lender.occupational_info: I am a student in fifth grade. I am a son and brother. I do my work to do it right. I think every thing through.

lender.name: Satoko
lender.loan_because: I hope that people around the world are Happy and Smile!!

lender.name: Warren
lender.loan_because: It's time to give back to those who have the drive to make a difference, support their family and be involved in their local economy and better their way of life.
lender.occupational_info: Not only is teaching children rewarding, but you have the chance to engage in life long learning too. Children often remind me of what is good in the world. Their unbias outlook in life, their dreams of endless possibilities and their naturally tendency to help others make my worse days seem amazing. As political as a school can be, the effort it takes to teach children or the upset parents you deal with - all I need to do is escape into a classroom where magic happens for these children.

lender.name: Jasmine M.
lender.loan_because: I´m able to do.
lender.occupational_info: I´m a housekeeper ☺.

lender.name: Charles
lender.loan_because: In this small way I can contribute to the improvement of life for women and families. I just wish I had more to loan.
lender.occupational_info: I am retired now, but I during my career I worked in 17 countries in Asia and Latin America to promote small scale aquaculture, mostly in coastal areas.

lender.name: Azza
lender.loan_because: I am able. I was inspired by Bill Clinton's speech and his book "Giving".

lender.name: Alex Pompel
lender.loan_because: I wanna make a difference!

lender.name: Brianna
lender.loan_because: I also have an entrepreneurial spirit. I believe that entrepreneurs are the hardest working people in the world and I greatly respect those that can envision and create a successful business to provide for themselves, their families and their communities

lender.name: Tsuyoshi
lender.loan_because: There is a Japanese saying "Helping people is not for the others" - Someday, somebody will help me back.
lender.occupational_info: Research and determine the specific requirement for the service/product, Then develop it, launch it and observe it goes on track or not. Otherwise, put some big-mouths into the business cases.

lender.name: Jeremiah
lender.loan_because: i believe that helping people create a stable income for themselves is important.

lender.name: Bettina
lender.loan_because: I want to support people to make their lives a little easier and convenient.

lender.name: Lena
lender.loan_because: I want to give women a chance to grow as a person and get freedom in their work, and a possibility to give their children a chance for education
lender.occupational_info: I work in a hospital in Denmark, but lives in Sweden. We rehabilitate persons over 65 years old, so they can go back home to their own home again I also work with homeopathy and zonetherapy In the photo to the left you can see our little pet dog, named Majsan

lender.name: Keziah and David
lender.loan_because: We're lucky enough to be able to.
lender.occupational_info: Keziah creates digital versions of old books and papers. David helps people to resolve workplace disputes.

lender.name: Sylke
lender.loan_because: One hand should help another.

lender.name: Cartel Agency Inc.
lender.loan_because: we are lucky enough to be able to. Being business operators ourselves we love the idea of assisting others to partake in the commercial world.
lender.occupational_info: Integrated marketing communications.

lender.name: sabine
lender.loan_because: i like to help other people. and i know, they´ll do their best!!! :-))

lender.name: Roope
lender.occupation: I wish there would be an easy way to explain

lender.name: Tom and Judy
lender.loan_because: the wealth of our planet is in great need of redistribution in a more equitable manner. Kiva offers the opportunity to contribute to this effort.
lender.occupational_info: social and biological sciences

lender.name: Sierra
lender.loan_because: I care.
lender.occupational_info: My husband is in the army so we are always moving. I am a teacher but right now I'm not working in a school and I am happy to be a stay at home mom with my daughter.

lender.name: Lorenz
lender.loan_because: I believe in micro-financing and want to support people around the world achieving their goals and improving their business. Kiva's concept convinced me using their modern peer2peer platform.

lender.name: Dinovias
lender.loan_because: I like the idea of my money doing something useful instead of simply lying around on my bank account. And it's just fun to help individuals all over the planet to build up their own future...
lender.occupational_info: I study law, and my goal is to become a lawyer. I'm most interested in contract law as well as family law. In private, I love to play and to listen to music (I play the alto, participating in several local orchestras). I'm also trying to improve my chess skills, and for sports I attend the Ju-Jitsu training once or twice a week.

lender.name: Joe
lender.loan_because: 2 Corinthians 8:9 For you know the grace of our Lord Jesus Christ, that though he was rich, yet for your sake he became poor, so that you by his poverty might become rich.
lender.occupational_info: I am a computer programmer developing Oracle databases, Business Objects reporting solutions, and internet applications.

lender.name: frederik
lender.loan_because: Bonjour, J'aimerais aider de jeunes entrepreneurs a réussir en affaires.
lender.occupational_info: Je travail dans l'immobilier au Canada.

lender.name: Nicole
lender.occupational_info: I work in Germany as an online journalist for sports, music, travel and lifestyle.

lender.name: James
lender.loan_because: Wonderful process for helping people help themselves

lender.name: Mei
lender.loan_because: I want to help women in the difficult situation.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a very small office as a clerk everyday. So,I respect entrepreneurs.

lender.name: Martina
lender.loan_because: I spent some time in Latin America (Chile and Brazil) and had a very good time there. Now I would love to contribute to empower women entrepreneurs. I lend only to women, preferably to mothers, and find that they are very hard-working and reliable and totally deserve my trust.
lender.occupational_info: I am a freelance journalist who writes for women's magazines. I also design knitwear and sell knitting patterns through my website. I work from home and have two kids (son, 5 years and daughter, 2 years).

lender.name: Greg
lender.loan_because: I can, and I should

lender.name: chris
lender.loan_because: small things can make a difference in life.
lender.occupational_info: I am a pastor in a small congregation in a small town in rural midwestern United States

lender.name: georgette
lender.loan_because: I feel truly blessed to have everything in my life; my family, my health, food, security, and a home- I wish everyone one could share the simple joys of having such luxuries, (yes, these are luxuries!) Its seems everything we have here in the West we so often take for granted...its easy to forget how blessed you are compared to another person half way across the world- yet this site reminds me that when it comes to giving, every little bit helps to make someone else's hardships easier- I pray for the successes of these enterpreneurs in their ventures, and I applaude their efforts to make themselves and their communities better. It makes me happy to see their stories of success, and allows me to see the best in humanity- I so rarely see it anymore, so this site gives me hope...
lender.occupational_info: Typical office work- I sit all day long in front of a computer and then I go home to work all night on my laptop in my free time studying online school work!! I spend more than 12 hours a day almost 7 days a week working on a computer!!! I feel like I will go blind by the time I turn 35.....

lender.name: Renate
lender.loan_because: I think that's a good way to help others

lender.name: Leonardo
lender.whereabouts: São Leopoldo Rio Grande do Sul

lender.name: Zahid
lender.loan_because: I want to see people lift themselves out of poverty.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a computer programmer.

lender.name: Marianne
lender.loan_because: Quand on vous montre le bon exemple, il ne vous reste plus qu'à le suivre !

lender.name: Alex
lender.loan_because: i feel that, with the right tools, entrepreneurs in the developing world can better their lives and the lives of their children.
